channel.title: Comments on: How to Shoot Yourself in the Foot in Any Programming Language
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: xtreeq
item.dc:creator: xtreeq
item.content:encoded:
Nice one too:
“C#:
Copy how Java shot itself in the foot. Explain how you did it better. “

item.title: By: xtreeq
item.dc:creator: xtreeq
item.content:encoded:
Loved this one:
“Javascript
YOu’ve perfected a robust, rich user experience for shooting yourself in the foot. You then find that bullets are disabled on your gun.”

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: I might take you up on your offer /old-blog/?p=383#comment-770 and kick your ass
item.content:encoded:
I might take you up on your offer
/old-blog/?p=383#comment-770
and kick your ass

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description:
One doesn't have to be a geek in order to screw up with your blog, if I recall correctly, it only takes few characters in Hebrew.
Be careful with your words, I'm still in the denial phase.
item.content:encoded:
One doesn’t have to be a geek in order to screw up with your blog, if I recall correctly, it only takes few characters in Hebrew.

Be careful with your words, I’m still in the denial phase.

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: I forgot to mention that I wanted to call this blog post: "If you laugh at this, you're a geek"
item.content:encoded:
I forgot to mention that I wanted to call this blog post:
“If you laugh at this, you’re a geek”

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description:
very funny.
In ML it depends on what <i>type</i> of gun you have.
item.content:encoded:
very funny.

In ML it depends on what type of gun you have.
